revised_title: Acoustic Resonance in Enhanced Nuclear Paramagnets: HoVO4 Experiments
tldr: The authors conducted experiments using acoustic waves in enhanced nuclear paramagnets, specifically in HoVO4, to study nuclear magnetism and spin-lattice relaxation. They compared the acoustic velocities at 1 GHz with those at 10 MHz and discussed the advantages of using acoustic waves over electromagnetic radiation. The study also focused on the preparation of ZnO transducers and their application in the experiments.
